channel.description: Recent content in SQLAlchemy on Frederico Gago – Tech Blog

item.title: Unit of Work (UoW) in Python with SQLAlchemy: explicit transactions, savepoints, and outbox
item.description: How I designed an asynchronous, scalable UoW with SQLAlchemy: explicit transaction boundary, nesting with savepoints, transactional outbox, idempotency, and a manager that works across API, CLI, and workers.
